Kirk Goddard is an NLP Engineer with an expertise in natural language processing, linguistics, and cognitive neuroscience.
He is interested in applying AI to language-related tasks that can be useful to writers and readers.
He has a blend of experience working across academia and industry.
He studied and researched topics like eye movements in reading and auditory feedback alteration in speech production at University of Massachusetts ([UMass](https://www.massachusetts.edu/)), US and the Basque Center on Cognition, Brain and Language ([BCBL](https://www.bcbl.eu/en)), Spain.
Following that, he also worked at [Apple](https://apple.com/) in the US.
Currently, he is an NLP Engineer at [Writer](https://writer.com/).

:::
